definition: A sweet, edible fruit produced by an apple tree (Malus domestica)
A written or printed work consisting of pages bound together, forming a source of information or entertainment
A thing you sit on

rigid supportive or protective structure or framework of an organism - especially : the bony or more or less cartilaginous framework supporting the soft tissues and protecting the internal organs of a vertebrate
a hard rigid usually largely calcareous covering or support of an animal
defensive covering for the body - especially: covering (as of metal) used in combat
a recording of moving images that tells a story and that people watch on a screen or television
a crystalline compound NaCl that consists of sodium chloride, is abundant in nature, and is used especially to season or preserve food or in industry
a long, curved fruit with yellow skin and yellow or green fruit
a small metal or wooden thing used to open or unlock something
a round piece of fabric used as a protection from the rain or sun

the luminous celestial body around which the earth and other planets revolve, from which they receive heat and light, which is composed mainly of hydrogen and helium, and which has a mean distance from earth of about 93,000,000 miles (150,000,000 kilometers), a linear diameter of 864,000 miles (1,390,000 kilometers), and a mass 332,000 times greater than earth
a flower with large yellow petals with a yellow center
a woody plant with branches, leaves, fruit, thorns, and seeds
a liquid substance that is interchangeable with air
a large fruit with a thick green skin and yellow flesh
a cereal grain with a yellow skin and yellow or green flesh
a part of the arm that is used to hold or carry something
a watch with a watch face and a watch strap
a band or chain that is worn around the wrist
a part of a person's body that can be used to hold or carry something
a bag with a hand covering
a band or chain that is worn around the wrist
a thing you sit on
a small animal with a long tail and four small sharp-edged teeth. You can also use with a computer.
a device that is used to input information from the computer
a small rectangular piece of paper with a mouse on it
a machine that can store data and process information
